g_flags: Have no shortness of breath, fever below 100, no or slight cough, no chest pain, and eating and drinking liquids normally
y_means: You may have developed an infection, or your medication may need to be changed
r_flags: Trouble breathing, or breathing faster than normal, with or without exercise.
r_means: You need to be evaluated by a health care professional immediately.

g_flags: Are prescribed medications, and you take as directed.

y_flags: Have a fever of 100.4 more than 72 hours
r_flags: New chest pain that gets worse when you take a deep breath or cough
